newsitem.title: USA: U.S. to allow Mexican avocados into 19 states.
newsitem.headline: U.S. to allow Mexican avocados into 19 states.

text.p: The U.S. government announced on Friday it was significantly relaxing an 83-year-old ban on the importation of Mexican avocados into the continental United States.

The Agriculture Department said that avocados from certain parts of Mexico that meet all U.S. import requirements can be shipped into 19 northeastern and midwestern states from November through February, beginning in November this year.
